title: Digital Business Consultant

responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Zespół Data Science optymalizuje i automatyzuje filary naszego biznesu, głównie skupiając się na rekomendacjach treści i reklam. Dbamy, aby użytkownicy i użytkowniczki dostawali to, czego jeszcze nie wiedzą, że chcą. To wyzwanie, bo mamy tylko ułamek sekundy na podjęcie decyzji, skalując rozwiązania na ponad 20 milionów użytkowników i użytkowniczek w Polsce.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Oprócz rekomendacji zajmujemy się też innymi wyzwaniami. Walczymy ze spamem i wyceniamy reklamy, bo każda sekunda uwagi ma swoją wartość.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Dbamy o długowieczność naszych modeli, rozwijając środowisko do ich automatycznego zarządzania i wspierając inne zespoły w tematach Machine Learningu.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

To świetnie trafiłeś/aś!","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Tego lata zrealizujesz projekt dla milionów użytkowników i użytkowniczek. Tego lata nie pożałujesz.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Podejmij wyzwanie, zrób zadanie i aplikuj do programu stażowego RAS TECH Summer.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"analiza stanu obecnego (AS-IS): identyfikacja dotychczasowych działań i sformułowanych rekomendacji;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"opis procesów organizacyjnych: opracowywanie map procesów (TO-BE);","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"standaryzacja procesów: wdrożenie systemu zarządzania procesowego oraz aktualizacja wewnętrznej Metodyki Zarządzania Procesami;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"ustalanie właścicieli procesów: wyznaczanie jasnych granic odpowiedzialności dla poszczególnych komórek organizacyjnych oraz przypisanych im KPI;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"wsparcie optymalizacji procesów: ciągłe doskonalenie (Kaizen);","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"koordynacja wymiany informacji: skuteczna wymiana informacji między komórkami organizacyjnymi realizującymi podobne zadania/procesy w celu wypracowania optymalnych rozwiązań;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"analiza procesów przed wprowadzeniem nowych usług: zapewnienie najwyższej efektywności i zgodności z celami organizacji;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"prowadzenie warsztatów/szkoleń zarządzania procesowego.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"wykształcenie wyższe","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"minimum 5 lat doświadczenia zawodowego","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"minimum 3 lata doświadczenia w zarządzaniu procesami, optymalizacji procesów oraz budowaniu i raportowaniu wskaźników biznesowych;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"minimum 5 lat doświadczenia w mapowaniu procesów (w tym przy użyciu Enterprise Architect) i zapewnianiu niezbędnej dokumentacji dla procesów podlegających przejściu lub optymalizacji;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"umiejętność zbierania, analizowania i prezentowania danych oraz oceny wyników analiz;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"umiejętność wyciągania wniosków popartych analizą kosztów i korzyści oraz rekomendowania usprawnień i reorganizacji procesów;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"umiejętność skutecznego komunikowania się, w tym facylitowanie spotkań;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"znajomość języka angielskiego na poziomie B2;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"znajomość Enterprise Architect.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Senior Business IT Consultant for Automotive
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Working as an independent consultant and advising our clients from the automotive industry, in the process of digital transformation, digitization, Industry 4.0, etc.;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Multi-aspect analysis, modeling and improvement of business processes, organizational structures and client's IT environments, as well as defining appropriate IT solutions;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Preparing concepts, planning and supporting the implementation of prepared solutions;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Conducting presentations and workshops with clients;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Co-creating offers for clients;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Supporting our clients in key processes in the automotive industry - production, logistics, marketing, sales and after-sales service - and implementing innovative trends in the industry such as connected car, customer interaction, in car services, autonomous driving, etc.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Supporting and mentoring less experienced consultants and leading small consulting teams.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"You have at least 2 years of experience in IT consulting, designing IT architectures or implementing IT systems in enterprises, especially in the automotive industry;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You have experience in analysis, modeling and process improvement;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You are interested in the automotive industry and changes taking place in this industry;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You know current market trends such as: Digitalization, Customer First, Industry 4.0;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You feel good in relationships with people, you are a communicative person and find satisfaction in helping business partners and gaining their attention for your ideas and services;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You know German and English very well;","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You are good at analytical thinking - you can analyze processes/situations/problems in a structured way and propose solutions, focusing on the business goals of your activities.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Senior Business IT Consultant for Manufacturing
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Conducting consulting and roll-out projects for our clients from the manufacturing industry;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Organizing and moderating meetings and workshops with the clients’ representatives, during which you will learn about their business, current and future challenges and needs, as well as collect and structure the resulting requirements;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Analyzing, modeling, and identifying improvements of business processes as well as in IT systems and environments in order to propose and design changes and optimizations;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Cooperating with customers, technology experts and development teams to design new technology solutions or changes in existing IT systems and environments;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Defining requirements and creating specifications for new IT systems or changes and transformations of existing IT environments;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Presenting and discussing your solution ideas with diverse groups of stakeholders in order to win their acceptance and commitment;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Identifying opportunities for business development and new projects, as well as contributing to new offers for our clients;","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Supporting and mentoring less experienced consultants and leading consulting teams.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Data Science Manager
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Zarządzanie i wdrażanie analiz: Wdrażanie i zarządzanie wykorzystaniem analiz w celu spełnienia wymagań biznesowych, zapewnienie spójności w grupach użytkowników. Ustanawianie i zarządzanie funkcjonalnymi metodami, technikami i możliwościami analitycznymi.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Analiza problemów biznesowych: Ocena problemów biznesowych do rozwiązania oraz identyfikacja wewnętrznych i zewnętrznych źródeł danych.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Weryfikacja źródeł danych: Identyfikacja i weryfikacja zewnętrznych źródeł informacji istotnych dla potrzeb operacyjnych przedsiębiorstwa.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Definiowanie celów biznesowych: Definiowanie celów biznesowych dla inicjatyw i wyjaśnianie ich kierownikom biznesowym.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Analiza danych i modelowanie: Analiza danych o dużej objętości, szybkości i różnorodności (liczby, symbole, tekst, dźwięk i obraz). Rozwój perspektywicznych, predykcyjnych, opartych na modelach analiz w czasie rzeczywistym.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Zarządzanie danymi: Rozumienie identyfikacji, walidacji i wykorzystania wewnętrznych i zewnętrznych zbiorów danych z różnych procesów funkcjonalnych.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Budowanie zespołu: Rekrutacja talentów i budowanie zespołów o odpowiednich umiejętnościach do realizacji projektów.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Komunikacja z wysokim szczeblem zarządu: Prezentowanie i komunikowanie wyników analiz wysokiemu szczeblowi zarządu.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Minimum 8 lat doświadczenia w dziedzinie ilościowej i Data Science.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Silne podstawy ilościowe w statystyce i algebrze liniowej oraz znajomość programowania.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Znajomość technik klasyfikacji, filtrowania kolaboratywnego, reguł asocjacyjnych i heurystyk.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Znajomość zaawansowanych platform/narzędzi analitycznych, takich jak R/SAS, Python, Hadoop, Apache Spark oraz umiejętność wykonywania zapytań do baz danych.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Umiejętność generowania dashboardów i manipulowania oprogramowaniem do wizualizacji danych.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Silna praktyczna wiedza na temat technik analitycznych w modelowaniu statystycznym, uczeniu maszynowym, ze szczególnym uwzględnieniem prognozowania opartego na czynnikach.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Doświadczenie w pracy z danymi z branży FMCG, żywności i napojów, handlu detalicznego lub podobnych branż będzie dodatkowym atutem.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Angielski komunikatywny na poziomie B2+","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Senior Business Analyst
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Conduct detailed business analysis of customers' requirements ensuring it aligns with airline operational needs.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Gather and document functional and non-functional requirements from stakeholders, including airline load controllers and ground operations teams.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Perform gap analysis between customer needs and existing system capabilities.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Collaborate with Software Developers, UX Designers, and QA teams to provide business insights and assist in test scenario creation.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Define and decompose requirements into user stories for the development teams.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Maintain product functional documentation and define clear Acceptance Criteria.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and validate new features to ensure compliance with airline and regulatory standards.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Facilitate and participate in client meetings, teleconferences, and workshops to discuss requirements and solutions.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Travel to customer sites when required to support implementation, training, and process optimization.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"5+ years of experience in business analysis, ideally in aviation, logistics, or software development.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Proven ability to gather and translate business requirements into technical specifications.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong knowledge of airline operations, weight & balance, or load planning (must-have).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with business analysis standards (e.g., UML, system use cases, business cases).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Familiarity with software development methodologies (Agile, Scrum).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Hands-on experience with software design tools (e.g., Enterprise Architect, yED).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Basic knowledge of XML/XSD for data structure analysis.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Excellent customer engagement and communication skills.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks effectively.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Fluent English (spoken and written).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Fluent Polish.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Mid DevOps Data Engineer (+ Azure Data Factory)

title: LCA Analyst
specializations: Big Data / Data Science, Business analytics
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Conduct advanced LCA modelling to evaluate environmental impacts (carbon, water, energy, waste) across full product life cycles. Develop comparative analyses of materials, processes, and supply chain alternatives to inform sustainability strategies.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Design and implement methodologies for Life Cycle Costing (LCC), Social LCA (SLCA), and Full Cost Accounting (FCA) to quantify economic and social impacts alongside environmental metrics.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Ensure strict adherence to ISO 14040/14044, ISO 14067, EN 15978, and EU Product Environmental Footprint (PEF) standards during model development and reporting.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Lead critical reviews of LCA studies and validate third-party assessments for methodological accuracy.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Build complex LCA models in SimaPro Craft and contribute to the development of standardized libraries/templates for the Synergy platform. Optimize workflows for data input, impact allocation, and scenario testing.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Troubleshoot technical challenges in database integration and model interoperability across software tools (e.g., GaBi, openLCA).","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Partner with R&D, supply chain, and product teams to integrate LCA insights into eco-design, circular economy initiatives, and decarbonization roadmaps.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Deliver actionable recommendations for reducing Scope 3 emissions, improving material efficiency, and achieving certifications (e.g., EPDs, Cradle-to-Cradle).","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Master’s/PhD in Environmental Engineering, Industrial Ecology, Chemical Engineering, or related field with thesis/applied work in LCA.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"5–7+ years in conducting ISO-compliant LCAs for manufacturing, energy, or consumer goods sectors.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Proven track record in SimaPro (Craft and Synergy), including model customization, library development, and uncertainty analysis.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Expertise in at least two additional methodologies: LCC, SLCA, FCA, or TEA (Techno-Economic Analysis).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Advanced proficiency in Python/R for automating LCA workflows and parsing large datasets.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Fluency in interpreting Ecoinvent, GaBi, and industry-specific databases.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Deep familiarity with ISO 14025 (EPDs), GHG Protocol, and Science-Based Targets initiative (SBTi) criteria.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Ability to manage 3–5 concurrent projects under tight deadlines while maintaining <5% margin of error.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Persuasive communication skills for influencing cross-functional stakeholders, including non-technical audiences.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"English language proficiency is a must, both verbal and written .","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

requirements: [{"requirements":"Doświadczenie w analizie instrumentów finansowych (np. obligacje, instrumenty pochodne, depozyty)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Znajomość Hedge Accounting lub chęć do nauki w tym zakresie","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Umiejętność przeprowadzania testów warunków skrajnych płynności i znajomość zasad zarządzania płynnością","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Zrozumienie IRRBB i jego wpływu na bilans banku","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Biegła znajomość SQL i doświadczenie w pracy z dużymi zbiorami danych","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Doświadczenie w pracy z Jira i zarządzaniu zadaniami w metodyce Agile","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Wysoki poziom języka angielskiego (C1/C2) – zarówno w mowie, jak i piśmie","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Samodzielność w organizacji pracy i definiowaniu zadań","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Assistant Vice President - Data Analytics
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"The role in the Data Management and Analytics team supports GRADE (Global Risk Analytics Data Environment) platform analytical projects. Our data is pivotal for WCR (Wholesale Credit Risk) model development, validation, and monitoring at HSBC. We handle risk data through activities such as ingesting data from internal and external sources, measuring and monitoring data quality, and providing visualizations.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Data Analysis - collate, test and check independently sourced data and assess its robustness and fitness for purpose.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Learn and understand source systems data, models and data standards.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Understanding data requirements from model development & monitoring teams, working on DQ issues, liaising with project teams for new ingests or data assets, working with teams to ensure data governance and compliance.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Develop ETL pipelines to make data assets available on GRADE.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Contribute to designing roadmaps for data, application and business process architecture to support future state environments.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Prepare effective material for dissemination to key business stakeholders at all levels of seniority.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Effectively manage relationships across key functional teams.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Work with management to prioritize business and information needs.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Solid and relevant experience in a similar job role.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Bachelor’s degree in IT or a numerate subject; Master’s degree preferred.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong theoretical and practical knowledge of programming tools, including proficiency in at least one of the following tools: SAS, Python, PySpark, SQL, and Hadoop Big Data, experience with Prophecy is a plus.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Business Analysis – requirements gathering and specification.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Ability to comprehend complex data architecture.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong organizational, analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Multitasking ability and the capacity to work under pressure within tight timelines are essential.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Working knowledge of JIRA, Confluence, and Monday.com.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Open personality with effective communication skills and the flexibility to work in an international team.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Previous experience in IT/Analytics is desirable.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Preferable knowledge of banking risk data, systems, and risk models.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Data Science Manager
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Lead the implementation of analytics solutions to meet business requirements.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Establish and manage analytical methodologies and techniques to enable data-driven decision-making.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Assess business challenges and identify relevant internal or external data sources.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Validate and integrate external data sources aligned with operational needs.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Define business objectives for data initiatives and communicate insights to senior management.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Develop predictive, real-time, and model-based insights using advanced analytics techniques.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Manage and mentor a team, ensuring the right mix of skills for project success.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"8+ years of experience in data science or a related quantitative discipline.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong background in statistics, linear algebra, and programming.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Expertise in classification techniques, collaborative filtering, association rules, and heuristics.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Hands-on experience with analytics platforms/tools such as R, SAS, Python, Hadoop, and Apache Spark.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Ability to query databases and generate dashboards using data visualization tools.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience working with FMCG, Food & Beverages, Retail, or similar industries is a plus.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong communication skills to translate data insights into business language.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Fluent in English (additional European languages are a plus).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Senior Business Analyst
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Acts in a liaison capacity with other departments, divisions and organizations, and between client end-users, programmers and test analysts. Understands client's strategic needs (profitability) and develops high-level client relationships and confidence in the solutions to their automation needs. Provides Subject Matter Expert (SME) advice and experience to clients and management for client initiated requests. Leverages expert knowledge of the complex nature of the client's business to recommend changes to existing systems or external vendor systems. Consults with management to identify, define, and document business needs and objectives, current operational procedures, problems, input and output requirements, data scope, usage formatting, security requirements and levels of systems access. Maintains communication with end-users and reviews other Business Analysts' feedback to ensure systems continually meet the client's expectations. Analyzes complex/escalated problems/issues (complexity varies based on data requirements and business specifications) and offers alternative business solutions. Leads meetings and discussions.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Makes recommendations which have significant impact on the technical aspects of projects and programs. Provides strategic guidance and expertise to analyze, interpret, develop and implement intricate business specifications and logical flowcharts that include features and functions from which programmers can create complex technical specifications. Leverages system or module knowledge in the design of system screens and database structures. Consults and coordinates with programmers to design and develop requirements and analyze the feasibility of new systems and enhancements to existing systems; ensures the system design fits the needs of the users. Prepares input for system design, including final report and screen definition, logical system flow and implementation plans. Provides support to resolve potential issues that may cross multiple systems and affect the business process. Tracks application incidents to ensure a successful conclusion for internal and external clients. Identifies system impact of changes in the business, user needs, external business environment and operating systems. As highest-level technical business expert, provides both internal and external consulting services. Plans, conducts and directs research and/or development work on complex projects necessitating the origination and application of new and unique approaches.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"As the SME, reviews and advises on documentation for client training and documentation for installation of systems and their upgrades; universally understood procedures for permanent records; post-implementation problems and revision requests; procedures, methodology and/or application standards to include payment card industry and security related compliance. Provides expert advice; maintains, administers, and/or reviews all procedures, methodology and/or application standards to include payment card industry and security related compliance.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Provides in-depth analysis and recommends best practices when supporting testing/planning/validation by clarifying the intended functionality. Uses experience and expertise to ensure complex issues do not hinder a successful implementation.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Assigns project work to the Business Analyst(s) frequently. Plans development efforts on large/small projects, and may act as a Project Manager. Monitors project progress by tracking activity, resolving problems, publishing progress reports and recommending actions. Prepares technical reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends. Maintains software deployment plans and communicates these plans to the user community and ensures that users are apprised of any anticipated deviation from schedules.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Bachelor's Degree","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Relevant Experience or Degree in: Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Business or related field; or equivalent training or experience in lieu of degree","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Typically Minimum 8+ Years Relevant Exp","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Professional experience working with end-users to meet business needs","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Skills / Knowledge - Having broad expertise or unique knowledge, uses skills to contribute to development of company objectives and principles and to achieve goals in creative and effective ways. Barriers to entry such as technical committee review may exist at this level.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Job Complexity - Works on significant and unique issues where analysis of situations or data requires an evaluation of intangibles. Exercises independent judgment in methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for obtaining results. Creates formal networks involving coordination among groups.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Supervision - Acts independently to determine methods and procedures on new or special assignments. May supervise the activities of others.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Problem Solving - A seasoned, experienced professional with strong problem solving skills and problem resolution is based on a broad base of business knowledgeMS Office & Flowcharting - Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio. Familiar with several common drawing techniques using Visio or UML.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: AI Coding Assistant Integration and Governance Specialist
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Governance and Process Adherence: Collaborate with stakeholders, such as cyber, legal, hosting committees (external, AI etc.), model risk and governance forums to ensure compliance with bank policies and processes. Obtain necessary approvals for implementation.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Technical Evaluation: Contribute to the technical assessment of various AI-based coding assistants, analyzing their compatibility, performance, and integration capabilities within our organisation’s environment.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Vendor Engagement: Engage with vendors, procurement and legal team to negotiate contracts, commercial terms, and ensure seamless collaboration throughout the integration process. Keeping in mind the higher level of risks involved with Generative AI, especially IP infringement and IP protection.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"AI Expertise: Leverage your expertise in AI to contribute to the evaluation process and ensure optimal technical decisions.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Communication and Promotion: Design and execute communication strategies to disseminate information about AI coding assistant integration and enablement. title: Senior Data Software Engineer
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Data Architecture and Modeling: Design and implement robust data models, leveraging dimensional modeling principles to structure data for performance, usability, and scalability in reporting and analytics.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Contribute in the development of efficient ETL processes, data pipelines, and workflows to transform, integrate, and load data from multiple sources into the data lake.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Help solution and optimize data lake solutions that support high query performance and can scale with increasing data volume and complexity with appropriate industry standard KPIs.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Data Governance & Quality: Develop and enforce data quality standards, including validation, transformation, and cleansing rules to ensure data accuracy and consistency across the organization.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Performance Tuning: Perform detailed performance tuning of ETL processes and query optimization to improve data processing speeds and reduce latency in data access.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Develops a general understanding of TSYS/Global Payments, software platforms, and the credit card industry.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"BS in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business / Management Information Systems or related field (Experience in lieu of degree will be considered)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Typically minimum of 4 years of strong development background in ETL tools like GCP-Data Flow , PySpark , SSIS","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience in Google cloud platform - GCP Pub/Sub, Datastore, BigQuery, BigLake, AppEngine,","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience in a major cloud platform such as GCP, AWS, Azure is preferred","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong proficiency in languages such as Python, Java, Scala for data processing and pipeline development.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Expertise in designing star schemas, snowflake schemas, and other dimensional models per Kimball methodology.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"SQL Proficiency: Deep understanding of SQL, query optimization, and performance tuning.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Proficient in repo management, branching strategies, version control using GIT, VSTS and Teamforge, etc","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with Big Data: Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Kafka, DBT, Iceberg, Parquet) is a plus.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demand","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Excellent communication skills, verbal and written; should be able to cross-functionally collaborate across business teams (stakeholders) and other technology groups as needed.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Create diagrams using industry standards such as UML & C4 to create clear and concise documentation for knowledge transfer and communication duties. Diagram As Code experience with Mermaid or PlantUML is a plus.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Skills / Knowledge - A seasoned, experienced professional with a full understanding of the area of specialization; resolves a wide range of issues in creative ways. This job is fully qualified, career-oriented, and a journey-level position.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Job Complexity - Works on problems of diverse scope where analysis of data requires evaluation of identifiable factors. title: Analityk biznesowy

title: Analityk biznesowy (corpo, salesforce)
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Obecnie dla naszego Klienta z branży bankowości poszukujemy Analityka biznesowego (inaczej Customer Journey Specialist) z doświadczeniem w bankowości i we współpracy z klientami z sektora \"corpo\" - warunek konieczny ze względu na specyfikę pracy.","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tOsoba na tym stanowisku będzie pełniła rolę łącznika między interesariuszami a zespołem projektowym, łącząc perspektywę biznesową z potrzebami osób oczekujących konkretnych rozwiązań dla procesów lub narzędzi sprzedażowych.","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tZakres: analiza biznesowa i przedwdrożeniowa, definiowanie koncepcji rozwiązań oraz wymagań systemowych, wsparcie szkoleń, a także praca w metodyce Agile z wykorzystaniem JIRA.","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Min. 3 lata doświadczenia w podobnej roli","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Rozwinięte kompetencje miękkie, komunikatywność i proaktywną postawę","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Doświadczenie w pracy w banku lub instytucji finansowej, szczególnie w obszarze procesów biznesowych przy współpracy z klientem korporacyjnym","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Praktyczną znajomość Lean Management lub Service Design, w tym projektowania procesów z udziałem użytkowników końcowych (Kompas)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Znajomość narzędzi: BPMN, Miro, Enterprise Architect lub Camunda, MS Excel","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Umiejętność analizy i optymalizacji procesów z perspektywy klienta oraz biznesu","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Znajomość segmentacji klientów oraz sposobu obsługi firm przez banki lub instytucje finansowe (praca z klientem corpo)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Umiejętność tworzenia wymagań (nie tylko ich zbierania - to ważne)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

Focus on customer requirements, business value creation, and ensuring the backlog is understood and development-ready from the team’s perspective.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Decompose business requirements into development-ready User Stories with functional requirements, focusing on the solution created in the Gigabit project.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Collaborate with Product Management and System Engineering to align User Stories’ designs.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Evaluate business models or requirements and integrate them into technology solutions as well as technological implementation opportunities (business/technology bridge).","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Actively support your team with business process know-how.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Understand business and technical objectives of a project and work closely with the Product Owner, system designers, and DevOps team.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"At least 3 years of experience as a Business Analyst in international projects.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge and ability to visualize analysis into readable diagrams using UML notation (Activity Diagrams, Sequence Diagrams, Use Cases).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with tools like Enterprise Architect, Confluence, and Jira. Knowledge of using tools like Swagger is a plus.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Ability to learn new and complex project environments.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge of Structured Query Language (SQL).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge and ability to design using BPMN notation.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"English knowledge (at least B2+). Gigabit is an international project; English is the common language for both spoken collaboration and written requirements.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Data Scientist - obszar CRM
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Odpowiedzialność za rozpoznanie potrzeb klientów dzięki wykorzystaniu rozwiązań zaawansowanej analityki danych, uczenia maszynowego i sztucznej inteligencji","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Kreowanie inicjatyw analitycznych, których celem jest ciągła poprawa procesu budowy spersonalizowanych relacji z klientem","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Projektowanie, wdrażanie i utrzymywanie rozwiązań uczenia maszynowego i sztucznej inteligencji, w szczególności: segmentacje klientów, modele predykcyjne i systemy rekomendacji","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Ścisła współpraca z różnymi jednostkami Banku w ramach definiowania, implementacji i monitoringu rozwiązań analitycznych wspierających procesy biznesowe","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Proaktywne proponowanie usprawnień w istniejących procesach bazując na rozwiązaniach AI i data science dostępnych w Banku","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Tworzenie i rozwój feature store oraz data martów analitycznych przy współpracy z jednostkami IT","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Co najmniej 3 letnie doświadczenie w analityce biznesowej, analityce predykcyjnej lub przetwarzaniu danych (mile widziane w instytucji finansowej lub telekomunikacyjnej)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Doświadczenie w budowie i wdrażaniu rozwiązań z użyciem uczenia maszynowego i sztucznej inteligencji, np. modele klasyfikacyjne, segmentacyjne i rekomendacyjne","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Doświadczenie projektowe w współpracy z jednostkami IT, biznesowymi oraz dostawcami zewnętrznymi","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Wysokie zdolności analityczne, w tym umiejętność interpretacji danych i wyciągania wniosków","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Bardzo dobra znajomość SQL i Python","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Znajomość języka angielskiego umożliwiająca swobodną komunikację","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Starszy Analityk Hurtowni Danych

title: Senior Business Analyst
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Develop understanding of the current and target states for the Financial Engineering Infrastructure and modelling processes.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Work with the key stakeholder teams to produce business requirements and specifications for the modelling infrastructure tooling, innovation solutions and other changes.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Support agile delivery and take a lead in agile ceremonies (e.g. as a Scrum Master).","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Lead knowledge sharing with the modelling teams in adoption of the Financial Engineering coding excellence standards, support user trainings.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Define the business/functional architecture for the model execution and monitoring.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Work closely with Financial Engineering Developers on various stages of the model deployment to facilitate implementation of new models.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Plan and carry out functional testing for the changes.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Support analysis and resolution of the production issues and users’ model queries.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"May need to lead a small team of the other Business Analysts.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Degree in a quantitative subject and a minimum of 7+ years of experience as a Business Analyst in banking.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge in Credit risk modelling for EAD, LGD, PD model types, preferably under the AIRB (Advanced Internal Risk Based Models) framework.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong background in business analysis within change delivery and proficiency with producing artefacts such as business requirements, worked examples, functional architecture, data specifications, test plans etc.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Proven experience with data analysis involving data manipulation, definition of controls and lineage.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong experience with Agile ways of working.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"At least intermediate proficiency in SQL, Python.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Proficiency in JIRA.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong written and verbal communication skills including high proficiency in Microsoft office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and diagram-drawing tools (such Visio).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong interpersonal skills: ability to handle conflict and manage expectations, self-starter attitude with a can-do mind set, excellent problem-solving skills.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience in working with global teams across different geographies, culture and time-zones.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

requirements: [{"requirements":"Algorytmika i kodowanie: Potrafisz odwrócić drzewo binarne, pisząc kod na kartce – czujesz się pewnie w algorytmach i strukturach danych.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Git i zarządzanie wersjami: Umiesz cofnąć błędny commit w zdalnym repozytorium GitHuba (nawet na produkcji!), stosując rebase i force push, utrzymując spójność historii w sposób niewykrywalny.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Rozwiązywanie problemów: Masz zamiłowanie do myślenia o produkcie i rozwiązywania problemów – kod to dla Ciebie środek, a nie cel sam w sobie.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Doświadczenie w Pythonie: Minimum 2-letnia praktyka w programowaniu w Pythonie.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Umiejętności DevOps: Znajomość Dockera, Kubernetes, pisania skryptów w Bash, CI/CD oraz automatyzacji procesów wdrożeniowych.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Uczenie maszynowe: Dogłębna wiedza z zakresu data science i uczenia maszynowego (regresja, klasyfikacja, deep learning). projekty w obszarze zarzadzania, m.in. prowadzenie portfolio projektów, zarządzanie projektami; projekty wdrożeniowe, m.in. wdrożenia od podstaw, upgrady, migracje, transformacje technologiczne, wdrożenia zmian oraz regulacji, projekty o charakterze utrzymania lub ousourcingu.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Wsparcie procesów sprzedazowych: analiza potrzeb klientów, przygotowywanie ofert, prezentacje i warsztaty.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Wsparcie zarzadzania cyklem zycia projektów: estymowanie zakresu i pracochlonnosci, planowanie i dobór metod prowadzenia, harmonogramowanie, prowadzenie, raportowanie postepu, zarzadzanie ryzykiem.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Wsparcie planowania i koordynacji tworzenia produktów prac, koordynowania wykonania, przekazywanie wyników prac do klientów, koordynacja procesów testowych.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Przygotowywania produktów prac: analiz systemowych, analiz zakresu, dokumentów wymagań, projektów rozwiązań, dokumentacji powdrożeniowej.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Praca z systemami: analiza dokumentacji, projektowanie, konfiguracja, testowanie.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Udzial w ksztaltowaniu i skalowaniu kompetencji zespolu i calej praktyki, wdrazanie wybranych strategii budowania zasobów wiedzy, przekazywania wiedzy oraz szkoleń.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Praca w domenach biznesowych w roli konsultanta funkcjonalnego/technicznego, wlasciciela produktu lub eksperta.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Udzial w inicjatywach eksplorujacych nowe obszary budowania wartosci dla klientów, zwiazane z nowymi trendami rynkowymi, technologiami czy zmianami regulacyjnymi","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Digital Analytics Leader
specializations: Big Data / Data Science, Business analytics
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"W swojej codziennej pracy będziesz odpowiadać za:","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tMonitoring kluczowych KPI Departamentu e-Commerce (wraz z raportowaniem i analizą)","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tKoordynację pracy zespołu Web Analytics, który analizuje duże zbiory danych za pośrednictwem BigQuery i języka SQL, projektuje analitykę internetową (app+web) oraz wspiera zespoły e-commerce,","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tAnalizowanie wyników testów AB (współpraca przy etapie ideacji z biznesem, po analizę wyników i przedstawianie wniosków i rekomendacji),","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tPrzygotowywanie, analiz, raportów, rekomendacji dla innych działów w firmie,","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tDbanie o poprawność, kompletność oraz jakość danych na wszystkich etapach - od projektowania analityki, integracji, analizy i prezentacji,","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"},{"responsibilites":"•\tDbanie o aktualność dokumentacji analitycznej.","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Oczekujemy od Ciebie:","requirements-class":"t6laip8"},{"requirements":"•\tDoświadczenia 4-5 lat na stanowisku związanym z analityką internetową i zarządzaniem zespołem,","requirements-class":"t6laip8"},{"requirements":"•\tZnajomości i doświadczenia w Google Big Query (znajomość relacyjnych baz danych i języka SQL),","requirements-class":"t6laip8"},{"requirements":"•\tZnajomości i doświadczenia w Google Analytics 4 360, Google Tag Manager, Firebase, Survicate, MS Clarity,","requirements-class":"t6laip8"},{"requirements":"•\tWiedzy i doświadczenia w zakresie przeprowadzania testów A/B,","requirements-class":"t6laip8"},{"requirements":"•\tPraktycznego doświadczenia z narzędziami wizualizacyjnymi jak PowerBI, Looker lub podobnymi,","requirements-class":"t6laip8"},{"requirements":"•\tUmiejętności analizy danych (praca na dużych zbiorach danych), odkrywania insightów, prezentacji danych przed zespołami biznesowymi, formułowania wniosków i hipotez do testów A/B oraz współpraca z zespołami technicznymi w zakresie implementacji analityki i testów A/B.","requirements-class":"t6laip8"}]

title: Analyst, Model Risk Management (Retail Credit)
specializations: Big Data / Data Science, Business analytics
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Undertake model validation and testing activities as dictated by the Global Model Risk Policy including the assessment of; model inputs, calculations, reporting outputs, conceptual soundness of the underlying theory and the suitability of the use for its intended purpose, relevance and completeness of data, qualitative information and judgements, documentation, and implementation of the model.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Provide written reports detailing the results of validations highlighting issues identified during the validation.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Communicate technical model related information and results to Model Owners and Model Users through the course of a validation.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Contribute to management, regulatory, and external confidence in all models used across the group.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Master’s or PhD degree in a quantitative discipline like Financial Mathematics, Statistics, Econometrics, Quantitative Finance, Economics or Engineering.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with some statistical modelling software / programming language e.g. SAS, Python, R, Matlab, C++, VBA.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience of developing and reviewing models throughout the customer lifecycle.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience of conducting independent model reviews is beneficial.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Some knowledge in Retail Credit, Stress Testing and/or Front Office Modelling and an awareness of IRB and/or IFRS9 regulatory requirements.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge of statistical model and scorecard development techniques.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge of Risk models, performance metrics and risks and associated issues.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Some knowledge of internal procedures and local regulations and those of other country regulators would be an advantage.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: AI/ML Platform Architect

responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Strategy Development: Collaborate with leadership to shape AI/ML strategy, with a specific focus on Conversational AI applications and opportunities that align with company objectives.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Tactical Implementation: Design, build and deploy AI solutions that drive innovation in product development and operational processes.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Technical Expertise: Develop and optimize generative models for real-world applications; implement MLOps practices to ensure scalable deployment.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Project Leadership: Lead the end-to-end process of AI projects, from ideation and prototyping to production and monitoring, ensuring integration with existing business systems.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Generative AI Product Development: Spearhead the creation and integration of Generative AI models for personalized experiences, content generation or other innovative use cases in product development.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, engineers and product teams to implement robust generative models, ensuring smooth integration into the product lifecycle.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Emerging Technologies: Stay updated with the latest trends in Generative AI continuously bringing new ideas for AI-driven innovation.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Mentorship: Provide guidance and technical mentorship to junior engineers on AI/ML best practices with a focus on AI technologies.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field (PhD preferred).","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"5+ years of experience in building and deploying machine learning models, with proven experience in Generative AI.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Expertise in Python and ML frameworks, and deep learning architectures for generative models.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Proven experience in cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure for AI solution deployment.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience in developing products utilizing Generative AI models, such as image generation, natural language generation, or synthetic data generation.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Strong understanding of ML algorithms (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning) and Generative AI techniques.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience in scaling generative models and deploying them in production environments.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Excellent communication skills to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience in NLP, computer vision, and deploying large language models (LLMs) for content generation - is an advantage.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Hands-on experience with fine-tuning LLMs - is an advantage.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with MLOps frameworks and version control of models - is nice to have.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge of product design principles using AI and ability to drive cross-functional AI projects with a generative component - is an asset.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Zapraszamy na Praktyki Letnie w Departamencie Zarządzania Decyzjami Biznesowymi w Citi Handlowy w Łodzi. requirements: [{"requirements":"Proactive and Accountable: You are self-directed, responsible and action-oriented, with a strong customer service mindset and a focus on delivering substantial results","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"You are fluent in English and comfortable working in a global, multicultural environment; proficiency in additional languages is beneficial","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Educational Background: You hold a Master’s Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Engineering, Economics, Management Science, or Mathematics, providing a solid foundation for technical AI development","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Relevant Experience: You possess 3-5 years of experience in a similar role within a global organization","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"AI and Data Expertise: You have strong experience in designing and implementing AI use cases, machine learning, generative AI frameworks, Large Language Models (LLMs), and architectures, building data pipelines, and performing related data engineering activities; proficiency in programming languages like SQL and Python is essential","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Cloud Proficiency: You bring deep knowledge of cloud platforms, tools, and architecture, including Snowflake, SQL Server, Microsoft Azure AI and Data services","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"API and Data Integration Skills: You are skilled in working with APIs and integrating data sources into advanced analytics solutions","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Domain Knowledge: You are familiar with SAP ECC, S/4HANA, or the Ariba data model within the Source-to-Pay process area","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Data Scientist w Departamencie Customer Intelligence
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"prowadzenie różnorodnych projektów analitycznych we wszystkich obszarach działania Banku, w szczególności modelowanie i predykcja zachowań klientów, mikrosegmentacje, budowa ofertowych systemów rekomendacyjnych, identyfikacja trendów, potencjałów sprzedażowych itp.,","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"dobór najlepszej (spersonalizowanej) oferty do klienta w zakresie treści, produktu, kanału komunikacji z użyciem nowoczesnych metod uczenia maszynowego,","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"projektowanie, wdrażanie, utrzymywanie i rozwijanie systemów predykcyjnych na dużych zbiorach danych (również danych o wysokiej częstotliwości oraz danych w czasie rzeczywistym), w tym automatycznych procesów gromadzenia i przetwarzania danych na potrzeby data martów analitycznych","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"projektowanie eksperymentów w celu pozyskania niezbędnych informacji do modelowania,","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"uczestnictwo we wszystkich etapach powstawania nowego rozwiązania analitycznego we współpracy z innymi jednostkami Banku – od identyfikacji i zrozumienia problemu po wdrożenie umożliwiające poprawne wykorzystanie rozwiązania w procesach biznesowych,","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"szerzenie wiedzy i dobrych praktyk w zakresie analizy danych w celu rozwoju świadomego wykorzystywania ich w Banku,","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"opracowywanie zaawansowanych rozwiązań analitycznych jak najlepiej dopasowanych do potrzeb biznesowych,","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"przekazywanie wiedzy płynącej z danych w celu optymalnego przełożenia jej na decyzje zarządcze oraz procesy CRM.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"wykształcenie kierunkowe, obejmujące wiedzę z obszaru szeroko rozumianej analityki ilościowej (Matematyka, Statystyka, Metody ilościowe, Ekonometria i inne pokrewne),","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"minimum 3- letnie doświadczenie w programowaniu i rozwiązywaniu problemów biznesowych przy wykorzystaniu technik data science (mile widziane doświadczenie w bankowości),","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"znajomość w teorii i praktyce metod związanych z analizą ilościową i data science m.in. modeli ML/AI, metod optymalizacyjnych, analizy szeregów czasowych, redukcji wymiarowości (ekstrakcja i selekcja cech), systemów rekomendacyjnych, wizualizacji danych wielowymiarowych, analizy grafów / sieci,","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"umiejętność programowania w jednym z następujących języków: R, Python","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"biegła znajomość SQL oraz MS Office (w szczególności Excel) pozwalająca na samodzielną pracę analityczną z wykorzystaniem technik programowania,","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"wysoko rozwinięte zdolności analityczne, umiejętność interpretacji danych, samodzielnego wyciągania wniosków i ich klarownego prezentowania,","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"umiejętność koncentracji na biznesowej użyteczności tworzonych produktów analitycznych","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"inicjatywa w zakresie proponowania i wdrażania nowych rozwiązań analitycznych, usprawniania istniejących procesów, rozwiązywania bieżących problemów","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"umiejętności interpersonalne pozwalające na łatwą komunikację z innymi jednostkami w Banku oraz efektywne komunikowanie skomplikowanych pomysłów,","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Data & AI Competence Lead
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Na stanowisku Data & AI Competence Lead będziesz odpowiedzialny/a za dostarczanie nowoczesnych rozwiązań technologicznych wspierających rozwój naszych klientów. Będziesz nie tylko liderem/liderką technologii, ale także wsparciem dla swojego zespołu. Prowadzenie prezentacji i warsztatów biznesowych stanie się Twoją codziennością, umożliwiając Ci przekazywanie kluczowych informacji zarówno klientom, jak i zespołowi. W procesie sprzedaży wykorzystasz swoje doświadczenie lub zdobędziesz nowe umiejętności, biorąc aktywny udział w cross-sell i up-sell oraz identyfikując nowe możliwości rozwoju współpracy z klientami. Każda inicjatywa to szansa na kreowanie wartości i wprowadzanie innowacji.","responsibilites-class":"t6laip8"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Szukamy osoby z pasją do technologii. Kluczowe będą Twoje kompetencje techniczne – bardzo dobra znajomość technologii Microsoft, w tym: Fabric, Azure Databricks, Power BI. Twoim atutem będzie także znajomość aplikacji biznesowych z rodziny Microsoft Dynamics 365 (F&O, Sales, Customer Service) oraz rozwiązań chmurowych na platformie Azure.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Ważne są zdolności organizacyjne – potrafisz efektywnie zarządzać własnym czasem oraz pracą zespołu, a także podejmować trafne decyzje. Cechuje Cię analityczne myślenie, kreatywność i inicjatywa – zawsze szukasz lepszych rozwiązań i nie boisz się podejmować nowych wyzwań. Jesteś osobą komunikatywną, potrafisz nawiązywać relacje. Znajomość języka angielskiego na poziomie bardzo dobrym (w mowie i piśmie) jest koniecznością, by móc efektywnie współpracować na arenie międzynarodowej.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Lead Business Architect
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Be the expert in Enterprise Business Capability, Business Architecture, Process Excellence disciplines.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Independently and in partnership with subject matter experts of Business Capabilities define and align business capability roadmap(s) across multiple lines of business.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Build, manage and enhance the Bank-wide Capability Model (HCM) along an enterprise mindset to drive maturity, optimisation, and simplification of the HSBC Business Model.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Expand and promote the BBC as the common language of “what\" HSBC does to create desired business outcomes and experiences.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Collaborate with Business capability owners and key stakeholders (Business Process owners, Data Owners, and Technology leads) on leveraging the HSBC Capability model to deliver value in the form of strategic realisation & prioritisation, transformation and solutioning.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Influence and collaborate with data and technology architecture teams to incorporate business architecture principles and design patterns to increase consistency and operability across the Group.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Determine and deliver strategic roadmaps to build and extend business capabilities.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Drive the adoption of Business Architecture tools for connecting, discovering, and visualising the enabling components that work together to enable business capabilities.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Proven experience (5-7) years in business architecture, business process management or related field, preferably in the financial services industry. 3+ years’ experience working with business architecture related tools.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Solid understanding of business architecture concepts and best practices with the ability to be an advocate for leveraging enterprise business capability framework to deliver business value.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge of Architecture / Business Design and analysis modeling techniques, tools, and standard development.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Ability to make strategic recommendations to leadership and GB/GF Business Architecture teams.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Understanding of the creation and maintenance of business process models aligned with Group Business Architecture standards.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience using model-based representations that can be adjusted as required to collect, aggregate, or disaggregate complex and conflicting information about the business.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"The ability to visualise and create high-level models that can be used in future analysis to extend and mature the business architecture.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience modelling business capabilities and processes using a variety of tools and techniques.","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Wdrażanie i konfigurowanie rozwiązań wykorzystujących GPT, LLM, RAG zarówno na potrzeby PoC (Proof of Concept) jak i w środowiskach produkcyjnych klientów.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Optymalizacja wydajności modeli językowych w kontekście specyficznych zastosowań.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Analiza wymagań biznesowych i technicznych w celu dostosowania tworzonych rozwiązań do potrzeb użytkowników.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Współpraca z zespołami IT w celu integracji rozwiązań z istniejącymi systemami i aplikacjami.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Monitorowanie i ocena wydajności rozwiązań po wdrożeniu oraz wprowadzanie niezbędnych poprawek.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Przygotowywanie dokumentacji technicznej oraz raportów dotyczących wdrożeń i wyników.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Śledzenie najnowszych trendów i technologii w dziedzinie modeli językowych oraz proponowanie innowacji.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"EY.AI - Twoje możliwości na tym stanowisku rozszerza sztuczna inteligencja, która będzie Ci towarzyszyć i wspierać w codziennej pracy. responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Design, build, and maintain services and APIs to manage our data platform with an eye toward automation at enterprise-scale.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Design and develop dashboards providing deep insights into the health and usage of our data platform.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Implement best practices for data governance, security, and privacy to maintain the highest standards for data integrity.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Understand and integrate our analytics tools, including our BI platform, with multiple data products, ensuring high-quality delivery of data to our customers.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Create and maintain documentation for our analytics services and capabilities","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Work with data engineers, BI engineers, and product managers to translate business requirements to technical specifications for data platform operations capabilities.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Automating the process of releasing updates to data products with the highest quality.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Foster collaboration in team and cross-team settings.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Support development and telemetry of scalable and reliable data pipelines.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"}]
requirements: [{"requirements":"Bachelor's degree in analytics, information systems, computer science, data science, or","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"equivalent experience","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"5+ years experience building analytics systems and service pipelines","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Knowledge of relational, dimensional, and other data modeling","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with Confluent Cloud, including Kafka and Flink","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience integrating BI Platforms like Sisense","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"DevOps related","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"GitHub Actions","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Kubernetes (EKS, ArgoCD, Istio)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Terraform, Terragrunt","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Grafana","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"5+ years experience in using and building APIs","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Experience with one or more languages (Python, Java)","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Excellent communication, interpersonal, collaboration, and team skills","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Passionate about creatively solving business problems","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"requirements":"Meet multiple, challenging deadlines while communicating expectations clearly","requirements-class":"tkzmjn3"}]

title: Senior Business Technical Services Analyst
responsibilites: [{"responsibilites":"Learns to establish a positive rapport with the client(s) to develop and maintain long-term relationships, to understand the client's business, their objectives and expectations, and to gain experience in acting as go-to person on all aspects of services and support for assigned relationships.","responsibilites-class":"tkzmjn3"},{"responsibilites":"Assists in the evaluation process of the client's business requirements, effort estimation, and guiding the client to utilize standard solutions while maximizing revenue.
